languages.text: "Архонту нравилось смотреть, как я терзаю пришедших за ним ассасинов, и он назвал меня Злобой. Я отразил сотню покушений на Гипаэраля, а опоздал всего раз — но этого хватило, чтобы потерять нанимателя. И теперь я здесь".

traits.locale_text: "Архонту нравилось смотреть, как я терзаю пришедших за ним ассасинов, и он назвал меня Злобой. Я отразил сотню покушений на Гипаэраля, а опоздал всего раз — но этого хватило, чтобы потерять нанимателя. И теперь я здесь".
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "The Archon liked to watch me savage the assassins sent to kill him, and he named me Malice. I fended off a hundred attempts on Gipaeral's life, and only once was I too slow — but that was enough to lose my employer. And now I'm here."
languages.original_text: "Архонту нравилось смотреть, как я терзаю пришедших за ним ассасинов, и он назвал меня Злобой. Я отразил сотню покушений на Гипаэраля, а опоздал всего раз — но этого хватило, чтобы потерять нанимателя. И теперь я здесь".

traits.locale_text: "The Archon liked to watch me savage the assassins sent to kill him, and he named me Malice. I fended off a hundred attempts on Gipaeral's life, and only once was I too slow — but that was enough to lose my employer. And now I'm here."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "The Archon liked to watch me savage the assassins sent to kill him, and he named me Malice. I fended off a hundred attempts on Gipaeral's life, and only once was I too slow — but that was enough to lose my employer. And now I'm here."

traits.locale_text: "The Archon liked to watch me savage the assassins sent to kill him, and he named me Malice. I fended off a hundred attempts on Gipaeral's life, and only once was I too slow — but that was enough to lose my employer. And now I'm here."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "The Archon liked to watch me savage the assassins sent to kill him, and he named me Malice. I fended off a hundred attempts on Gipaeral's life, and only once was I too slow — but that was enough to lose my employer. And now I'm here."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “执政官很喜欢观赏我如何折磨那些派来刺杀他的刺客，于是给我取名叫‘恶棍’。我挫败了一百次针对吉帕拉尔的袭击，只有一次出手慢了，但这已经足以让我被扫地出门了，于是我就来了这里。”
languages.original_text: "The Archon liked to watch me savage the assassins sent to kill him, and he named me Malice. I fended off a hundred attempts on Gipaeral's life, and only once was I too slow — but that was enough to lose my employer. And now I'm here."

traits.locale_text: “执政官很喜欢观赏我如何折磨那些派来刺杀他的刺客，于是给我取名叫‘恶棍’。我挫败了一百次针对吉帕拉尔的袭击，只有一次出手慢了，但这已经足以让我被扫地出门了，于是我就来了这里。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Al Arconte le gustaba verme despedazar a los asesinos que enviaban contra él y me puso el nombre Malicia. Rechacé cien ataques contra la vida de Gipaeral y solo fui demasiado lento una vez... suficiente como para perder mi empleo. Y ahora estoy aquí».
languages.original_text: "The Archon liked to watch me savage the assassins sent to kill him, and he named me Malice. I fended off a hundred attempts on Gipaeral's life, and only once was I too slow — but that was enough to lose my employer. And now I'm here."

traits.locale_text: «Al Arconte le gustaba verme despedazar a los asesinos que enviaban contra él y me puso el nombre Malicia. Rechacé cien ataques contra la vida de Gipaeral y solo fui demasiado lento una vez... suficiente como para perder mi empleo. Y ahora estoy aquí».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「アーコンは彼を殺そうと企てるアサシンをなぶり殺しにする私を見るのが好きだったから、悪意を意味するマリスと名付けた。ギパラルの命は数えきれないほど救ったが、一度だけ隙を狙われた。その時に主を失った。だから、今こうしてここにいるわけだ」
languages.original_text: "The Archon liked to watch me savage the assassins sent to kill him, and he named me Malice. I fended off a hundred attempts on Gipaeral's life, and only once was I too slow — but that was enough to lose my employer. And now I'm here."

traits.locale_text: 「アーコンは彼を殺そうと企てるアサシンをなぶり殺しにする私を見るのが好きだったから、悪意を意味するマリスと名付けた。ギパラルの命は数えきれないほど救ったが、一度だけ隙を狙われた。その時に主を失った。だから、今こうしてここにいるわけだ」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Der Archon sah mir gerne zu, wie ich die Attentäter zerfetzte, die man auf ihn angesetzt hatte. Er gab mir den Namen Tücke. Ich einhundert Anschläge auf Gipaeral vereitelt, und nur einziges Mal war ich zu langsam — doch das war genug, um meinen Arbeitgeber zu verlieren. Und nun bin ich hier."
languages.original_text: "The Archon liked to watch me savage the assassins sent to kill him, and he named me Malice. I fended off a hundred attempts on Gipaeral's life, and only once was I too slow — but that was enough to lose my employer. And now I'm here."

traits.locale_text: "Der Archon sah mir gerne zu, wie ich die Attentäter zerfetzte, die man auf ihn angesetzt hatte. Er gab mir den Namen Tücke. Ich einhundert Anschläge auf Gipaeral vereitelt, und nur einziges Mal war ich zu langsam — doch das war genug, um meinen Arbeitgeber zu verlieren. Und nun bin ich hier."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « L'archonte aimait beaucoup me voir massacrer les assassins envoyés pour le tuer, c'est pour ça qu'il m'a donné le nom de "Démon". J'ai repoussé une centaine de tentatives de meurtre contre lui et je n'ai manqué de vitesse qu'une seule fois... mais ça a suffi pour que je perde mon employeur. Et puis je me suis retrouvé ici. »
languages.original_text: "The Archon liked to watch me savage the assassins sent to kill him, and he named me Malice. I fended off a hundred attempts on Gipaeral's life, and only once was I too slow — but that was enough to lose my employer. And now I'm here."

traits.locale_text: « L'archonte aimait beaucoup me voir massacrer les assassins envoyés pour le tuer, c'est pour ça qu'il m'a donné le nom de "Démon". J'ai repoussé une centaine de tentatives de meurtre contre lui et je n'ai manqué de vitesse qu'une seule fois... mais ça a suffi pour que je perde mon employeur. Et puis je me suis retrouvé ici. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Arkon, onu öldürmesi için gönderilen suikastçıları parçalayışımı izlemekten hoşlandığı için bana Melanet adını verdi. Canını yüz kere kurtarmışımdır ama bir saldırıda fazla yavaş kalıp üstadımı kaybettim. Şimdi de buradayım."
languages.original_text: "The Archon liked to watch me savage the assassins sent to kill him, and he named me Malice. I fended off a hundred attempts on Gipaeral's life, and only once was I too slow — but that was enough to lose my employer. And now I'm here."

traits.locale_text: "Arkon, onu öldürmesi için gönderilen suikastçıları parçalayışımı izlemekten hoşlandığı için bana Melanet adını verdi. Canını yüz kere kurtarmışımdır ama bir saldırıya yetişemeyince üstadımı kaybettim. Şimdi de buradayım."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
